definition: to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: We have nothing at all left for today's matinee.
sentences.chinese: 今天日場的票全售完了。

sentences.english: The houses within this price range are sold out.
sentences.chinese: 在這個價格範圍之內的房子已售完。

sentences.english: Within days, 2200 was nearly sold out.
sentences.chinese: 沒幾天工夫，2200幾乎全部售完。

sentences.english: The berth tickets are all sold out for today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的臥鋪票都已售完。

sentences.english: All out now, come earlier tomorrow.
When Chen Qizhen knew that the admission ticket total sells out, is affected, red eye socket .
sentences.chinese: 當陳綺貞得知門票全數售完，非常感動，紅了眼眶。

sentences.english: We would love to have gone to the match, but the tickets were all sold out.
sentences.chinese: 我們原想去看這場比賽的，但票已售完了。

sentences.english: Boxing and weightlifting joined the sold-out list on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 週六，拳擊和舉重項目的門票也售完。

sentences.english: We are sold out for the evening performance, but there is a matinee.
sentences.chinese: 我們晚上演出的票已經售完，但是日場演出還沒有。

sentences.english: Once the inventories are sold prices will begin to rise again.
sentences.chinese: 一旦存貨售完，價格將開始再次上升。

sentences.english: Ticket sales will be limited to one thousand.
sentences.chinese: 入場券共一千張，售完即止。

sentences.english: A sign on the box-office window says "All Sold Out".
sentences.chinese: 售票處窗子上掛了一個“全部售完”的牌子。

sentences.english: They sold out in a week.
sentences.chinese: 這一千張門票在一週時間內就售完了。

sentences.english: We hope soon to announce to you that we shall close the sale of the cambric .
sentences.chinese: 我們希望不久將能告知貴公司麻紗已全部售完。

sentences.english: Deluged merchants have run out of products and appointment times.
sentences.chinese: 很多商家的產品已經售完，或者預定時間內滿座。

definition: to be completely sold out/to sell out
advance sale/to sell in advance/to book
to buy frenetically/to snap up (bargains, dwindling supplies etc)
to place an order/to book ahead
to hit the market (of a new product)
to sell out/to run out (of supplies)/deficient/lack of supplies
to sell strongly/to be in great demand
